attributes.action: cushy prisons to be revoked, and a harsh place to live.
attributes.additional_details: After hearing of the absurd amounts of rights and privileges seen in prisons such as the use of gyms , televisions and games' consoles, prisons should be a horrible place to go and should be feared. To not only make future criminals fear the prospect of incarceration, but also to cut costs. there should be very basic, cheap food; and for prisons to be stripped of all privileges until down to the bare essentials.
